About


This Website will assist you in getting fully 100% completion rate in Bully: Scholarship Edition. There will be a breakdown for each of the 6 chapters in the game with tips and facts alongside the main guid.


Bully: Scholarship Edition is a Rockstar created title that was first released in Europe as "Canis Cenim Edit" as at the time the name "Bully" seemed too offensive for European audiences. The game is an open world grand theft auto styled action game, the game has a whole lot of tasks required for 100% completion, but with some dedication it can be done!


To navigate this website, you may either use the header at the top of the site for the different chapters, or you may use the images below to bring you to a chapter instead. Should you at any point wish to return to this about section, please press the Bullworth Academy Crest on the top left of the screen!


To do everything in this guide could take a long time, so dont be disheartened if you need a couple of days to finish everything, best of luck - Dylan :)
